markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tide-Hardened](/Feats.aspx?ID=2609) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You're at home in the unpredictable tides. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) and [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) effects. If you roll a success on a save against a cold or water effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Tide-Hardened

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Tide-Hardened Source Ancestry Guide pg. 118 2.0 --- You're at home in the unpredictable tides. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against cold and water effects. If you roll a success on a save against a cold or water effect, you get a critical success instead.
